name: Inlineresources
tagline: Inlines style sheets, images, fonts and scripts in HTML documents.
body:
Inlines style sheets, images, fonts and scripts in HTML documents. Works in the browser. See the [API](https://github.com/cburgmer/inlineresources/wiki/API). Limitations ----------- Resources referenced in the document (CSS, images, fonts and JS) can only be loaded if from the [same origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Same_origin_policy_for_JavaScript), unless techniques like [CORS](http://enable-cors.org) are used. Yet to be supported: * Background images in inline style declarations (`
`) * Media queries defined on link elements (``) * Future responsive img solution (``) Author ------ Christoph Burgmer. Licensed under MIT. Reach out [on Twitter](https://twitter.com/cburgmer).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
